scripts.heroku-prebuild: echo 'Installing frontend dependencies...' && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.build: echo 'Building React app...' && cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && echo 'Copying build files...' && cp -r frontend/build . && echo 'Build completed successfully'
